00042 static void compute_triangle_side_lengths(const ArrOfDouble& x,const ArrOfDouble& y,ArrOfDouble& l)
00043 {
00044   double dx,dy;
00045   for (int i=0; i<3; ++i)
00046     {
00047       dx = x[(i+1)%3] - x[i];
00048       dy = y[(i+1)%3] - y[i];
00049       l[i] = sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);
00050     }
00051 }
00052 
00053 static void compute_cell_qualities_for_triangle(const Domaine& domain, ArrOfDouble& quality)
00054 {
00055   const IntTab&    cells = domain.zone(0).les_elems();
00056   const DoubleTab& nodes = domain.les_sommets();
00057 
00058   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00059   quality.resize_array(nb_cells);
00060 
00061 
00062   ArrOfDouble x(3);
00063   ArrOfDouble y(3);
00064   ArrOfDouble l(3);
00065 
00066   double p,r,h;
00067 
00068   for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00069     {
00070 
00071       for (int i=0; i<3; ++i)
00072         {
00073           x[i] = nodes(cells(cell,i),0);
00074           y[i] = nodes(cells(cell,i),1);
00075         }
00076 
00077       compute_triangle_side_lengths(x,y,l);
00078 
00079       p = l[0]+l[1]+l[2];
00080       r = sqrt(p*(p-l[0])*(p-l[1])*(p-l[2]))/p;
00081       h = (l[0] > l[1]) ? ( (l[0]>l[2]) ? l[0] : l[2]) : ( (l[1]>l[2]) ? l[1] : l[2] );
00082 
00083       quality[cell] = ( h / r );
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00087 static double compute_tetrahedron_diameter(const ArrOfDouble& x,const ArrOfDouble& y,const ArrOfDouble& z)
00088 {
00089   double diameter = 0.;
00090   double dx,dy,dz,l;
00091   for (int i=0; i<4; ++i)
00092     {
00093       for (int j=i+1; j<4; ++j)
00094         {
00095           dx = x[j]-x[i];
00096           dy = y[j]-y[i];
00097           dz = z[j]-z[i];
00098           l = dx*dx + dy*dy + dz*dz;
00099           diameter = (diameter < l) ? l : diameter;
00100         }
00101     }
00102   return sqrt(diameter);
00103 }
00104 
00105 static double compute_tetrahedron_volume(const ArrOfDouble& x,const ArrOfDouble& y,const ArrOfDouble& z)
00106 {
00107   double volume = (x[1]-x[0]) * (y[2]-y[0]) * (z[3]-z[0]) +
00108                   (x[2]-x[0]) * (y[3]-y[0]) * (z[1]-z[0]) +
00109                   (x[3]-x[0]) * (y[1]-y[0]) * (z[2]-z[0]) -
00110                   (z[1]-z[0]) * (y[2]-y[0]) * (x[3]-x[0]) -
00111                   (x[2]-x[0]) * (z[3]-z[0]) * (y[1]-y[0]) -
00112                   (y[3]-y[0]) * (x[1]-x[0]) * (z[2]-z[0]);
00113 
00114 // GF est ce le lieu pour faire l'assert....
00115   if (volume<0.) volume=-volume;
00116   assert( volume > 0. );
00117 
00118   return (volume / 6.);
00119 }
00120 
00121 
00122 static double compute_tetrahedron_surface(const ArrOfDouble& x,const ArrOfDouble& y,const ArrOfDouble& z)
00123 {
00124   ArrOfDouble u(3);
00125   ArrOfDouble v(3);
00126 
00127   double surface = 0.;
00128   u(0) = x(2) - x(1);
00129   v(0) = x(3) - x(1);
00130   u(1) = y(2) - y(1);
00131   v(1) = y(3) - y(1);
00132   u(2) = z(2) - z(1);
00133   v(2) = z(3) - z(1);
00134 
00135   surface += 0.5 * sqrt( ( ( (u(1)*v(2)) - (u(2)*v(1)) ) * ( (u(1)*v(2)) - (u(2)*v(1)) ) ) +
00136                          ( ( (u(2)*v(0)) - (u(0)*v(2)) ) * ( (u(2)*v(0)) - (u(0)*v(2)) ) ) +
00137                          ( ( (u(0)*v(1)) - (u(1)*v(0)) ) * ( (u(0)*v(1)) - (u(1)*v(0)) ) ) );
00138 
00139   u(0) = x(3) - x(2);
00140   v(0) = x(0) - x(2);
00141   u(1) = y(3) - y(2);
00142   v(1) = y(0) - y(2);
00143   u(2) = z(3) - z(2);
00144   v(2) = z(0) - z(2);
00145 
00146   surface += 0.5 * sqrt( ( ( (u(1)*v(2)) - (u(2)*v(1)) ) * ( (u(1)*v(2)) - (u(2)*v(1)) ) ) +
00147                          ( ( (u(2)*v(0)) - (u(0)*v(2)) ) * ( (u(2)*v(0)) - (u(0)*v(2)) ) ) +
00148                          ( ( (u(0)*v(1)) - (u(1)*v(0)) ) * ( (u(0)*v(1)) - (u(1)*v(0)) ) ) );
00149 
00150   u(0) = x(0) - x(3);
00151   v(0) = x(1) - x(3);
00152   u(1) = y(0) - y(3);
00153   v(1) = y(1) - y(3);
00154   u(2) = z(0) - z(3);
00155   v(2) = z(1) - z(3);
00156 
00157   surface += 0.5 * sqrt( ( ( (u(1)*v(2)) - (u(2)*v(1)) ) * ( (u(1)*v(2)) - (u(2)*v(1)) ) ) +
00158                          ( ( (u(2)*v(0)) - (u(0)*v(2)) ) * ( (u(2)*v(0)) - (u(0)*v(2)) ) ) +
00159                          ( ( (u(0)*v(1)) - (u(1)*v(0)) ) * ( (u(0)*v(1)) - (u(1)*v(0)) ) ) );
00160 
00161 
00162   u(0) = x(1) - x(0);
00163   v(0) = x(2) - x(0);
00164   u(1) = y(1) - y(0);
00165   v(1) = y(2) - y(0);
00166   u(2) = z(1) - z(0);
00167   v(2) = z(2) - z(0);
00168 
00169   surface += 0.5 * sqrt( ( ( (u(1)*v(2)) - (u(2)*v(1)) ) * ( (u(1)*v(2)) - (u(2)*v(1)) ) ) +
00170                          ( ( (u(2)*v(0)) - (u(0)*v(2)) ) * ( (u(2)*v(0)) - (u(0)*v(2)) ) ) +
00171                          ( ( (u(0)*v(1)) - (u(1)*v(0)) ) * ( (u(0)*v(1)) - (u(1)*v(0)) ) ) );
00172 
00173   return surface;
00174 }
00175 
00176 static void compute_cell_qualities_for_tetrahedron(const Domaine& domain, ArrOfDouble& quality)
00177 {
00178   const IntTab&    cells = domain.zone(0).les_elems();
00179   const DoubleTab& nodes = domain.les_sommets();
00180 
00181   const int nb_cells = cells.dimension(0);
00182   quality.resize_array(nb_cells);
00183 
00184   ArrOfDouble x(4);
00185   ArrOfDouble y(4);
00186   ArrOfDouble z(4);
00187 
00188   double h,s,v;
00189 
00190   for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00191     {
00192 
00193       for (int i=0; i<4; ++i)
00194         {
00195           x[i] = nodes(cells(cell,i),0);
00196           y[i] = nodes(cells(cell,i),1);
00197           z[i] = nodes(cells(cell,i),2);
00198         }
00199 
00200       h = compute_tetrahedron_diameter(x,y,z);
00201       v = compute_tetrahedron_volume(x,y,z);
00202       s = compute_tetrahedron_surface(x,y,z);
00203 
00204       quality[cell] = ( (h*s) / v );
00205     }
00206 }
00207 
00208 static void compute_cell_qualities(const Domaine& domain, ArrOfDouble& quality)
00209 {
00210   const Nom& cell_type = domain.zone(0).type_elem().valeur().que_suis_je();
00211 
00212   Motcles understood_keywords(2);
00213   understood_keywords[0] = "Triangle";
00214   understood_keywords[1] = "Tetraedre";
00215 
00216   int rank = understood_keywords.search(cell_type);
00217   switch(rank)
00218     {
00219     case 0  :
00220       compute_cell_qualities_for_triangle(domain,quality);
00221       break;
00222     case 1  :
00223       compute_cell_qualities_for_tetrahedron(domain,quality);
00224       break;
00225     default :
00226       Cerr << "Error in Verifier_Qualite_Raffinements.cpp 'compute_cell_qualities()'" << finl;
00227       Cerr << "  Unknown cell type : " << cell_type << finl;
00228       Cerr << "  Verifier_Qualite_Raffinements can only check Triangles and Tetrahedrons" << finl;
00229       Process::exit();
00230     }
00231 }
00232 
00233 void Verifier_Qualite_Raffinements::verifier_qualite_raffinements(void)
00234 {
00235   const int nb_domains = domaines().size() ;
00236   assert( nb_domains > 1 );
00237 
00238   for (int i=0; i<nb_domains; ++i)
00239     {
00240       ArrOfDouble qualities;
00241       compute_cell_qualities(domaine(i),qualities);
00242 
00243       Nom filename("quality_");
00244       filename += Nom(i);
00245       filename += Nom(".gnu");
00246 
00247       SFichier os(filename);
00248       const int nb_cells = qualities.size_array();
00249       for (int cell=0; cell<nb_cells; ++cell)
00250         {
00251           os << qualities[cell] << finl;
00252         }
00253       os.close();
00254     }
00255 }
00256 
00257 
00258 Entree& Verifier_Qualite_Raffinements::interpreter_(Entree& is)
00259 {
00260   int nb_refinements;
00261   is >> nb_refinements;
00262 
00263   for (int i=0; i<nb_refinements; ++i)
00264     {
00265       associer_domaine(is);
00266     }
00267   verifier_qualite_raffinements();
00268   return is;
00269 }
